full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
---

## Invitation to Qualify (ITQ): CNST (Construction) 
### Reference Information 
  - **Reference Number:** 24-247444
  - **Publication Date:** September 8, 2023
  - **Tender Closing Date:** September 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM

### Project Description 
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Global Affairs Canada) intends to contract for the construction of a new Canadian Embassy fit-up in Armenia (Yerevan). 
This procurement is a competitive, open bidding process (CNST - Construction).

### Key Details 

  - **Procurement Category:** Construction
  - **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bid
  - **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
  - **Expected Contract End Date:** December 2, 2024

### Contact Information 
  - **Contracting Officer:** Meghan Tchorznickis
  - **Email:** [Meghan.Tchorznickis@international.gc.ca](mailto:Meghan.Tchorznickis@international.gc.ca)
  - **Phone:** (613) 292-7487

### Document Access
Access the tender notice and ITQ documents at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8872/24-247444---itq---construction---en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8872/24-247444---itq---construction---en.pdf) or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8872/24-247444---itq---construction---fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8872/24-247444---itq---construction---fr.pdf)
